page.title: 08WILD ANIMALS.
page.content: { }MANY WILD ANIMALS LIVE IN THIS AREA. I ASKED PEOPLE IN BLAGDON VILLAGE WHAT ANIMALS THEY HAD SEEN IN THE COUNTRYSIDE. SIX OF THEM HAD SEEN {FOXES}AND TWELVE HAD SEEN{RABBITS.}THE CHILDREN IN CLASS THREE HAD SEEN THIRTEEN SNAKES. SEVEN WERE{ADDERS AND SIX WERE{GRASS SNAKES.}SOME PEOPLE HAD SEEN{ROE DEER}IN THE WOODS AND MANY PEOPLE HAD SEEN{GREY SQUIRRELS.} THERE ARE A LOT OF SQUIRRELS AT COMBE LODGE. I LIKE ALL THESE ANIMALS BUT I LIKE THE FOX BEST; IT IS SO GRACEFUL. I DON'T THINK IT SHOULD BE HUNTED AND KILLED. FOXES ARE HUNTED WITH HORSES AND HOUNDS. MOST PEOPLE HUNT FOXES BECAUSE THEY LIKE THE SPORT. THEY KILL THE FOXES FOR THEIR TAIL. THE TAIL IS CALLED THE BRUSH. I THINK IT IS VERY CRUEL TO KILL FOXES IN THIS WAY.
